definitions.definition: the taking of a sample or samples.
examples: routine river sampling is carried out according to a schedule

definitions.definition: the technique of digitally encoding music or sound and reusing it as part of a composition or recording.
take a sample or samples of (something) for analysis.
try the qualities of (food or drink) by tasting it.
examples: try (out), taste, test, put to the test, experiment with; Moreappraise, evaluate, test drive; informalcheck out "we sampled the culinary offerings"Moreappraise, evaluate, test drive; check out we sampled the culinary offerings
sample the pleasures of Saint Maarten

definitions.definition: ascertain the momentary value of (an analog signal) many times a second so as to convert the signal to digital form.
record or extract a small piece of music or sound digitally for reuse as part of a composition or song.
